name: james-beard-foundation
title: James Beard Foundation
subtitle: The culinary Oscars online
synopsis:
While at *The Mechanism* I worked on a small team to help realize a modern website for this illustrious non-profit. Though that version of the site has since been replaced, we built it upon Drupal with designs from the client.

I was responsible for the front end, site navigation, general structure, and third party service integration (Twitter, Facebook, Open Table, Urbanspoon).

Moreover I was able to design and build certain interface widgets that weren't fleshed out in the original specifications like custom calendar and search widgets.
